quote: Helping people to pay less in taxes is one of the most patriotic things you can do.
why_clipworthy: It's a provocative statement that challenges common perceptions about taxes.
suggested_hook: Why paying less in taxes might be the most patriotic act.

why_clipworthy: The dramatic reduction in tax debt is attention-grabbing and demonstrates expertise.
suggested_hook: How one client reduced their tax debt from $249,000 to just $20.
